transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Prashant ji namaskar.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Namaskar. Prashant ji Sumit Choudhary baat kar raha hun senior manager IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Aap ye aapka jo account manager hai ye aapne unke liye kuch feedback diya tha not satisfied ka waha se.
Executive: Main unke manager baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan. Diya tha maine isme kya dikkat hai. Feedback ka matlab ye to nahi hota hai na ki positive hi feedback mile aapko.
Executive: Nahi sir ye matlab nahi hota hai but wo negative jo milta hai uske cheez ka hum solution bhi to dhoondte hai na.
Customer: Seedha seedha hai main aapko batata hun suniye meri baat.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Jaise hamare ghar mein char vehicle hote hain.
Haan.
Customer: To char mein se hame koi pasand hota bhi hai nahi bhi hota hai magar fir bhi kaam chal raha hai.
Customer: Mere paas IndiaMART se phone aata hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Aur main IndiaMART ka bahut purana customer hun. 10 saal ho gaye mujhe.
Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai IndiaMART pe 2014 se listed hun. Aur paid customer hun.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: To mere paas jab phone aata hai IndiaMART se puchte hain kaise chal raha hai theek chal raha hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Bataiye sir kuch bataiye. Nahi sab kuch theek chal raha hai main ye keh ke baat khatam karne ki apni koshish karta hun. Theek hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Agar jab aap mujhe kuredoge.
Haan.
Customer: Ek aad baar ho gayi do baar ho gayi.
Hmm.
Customer: Fir agar main koi baat batata hun.
Hmm.
Customer: Us par response nahi aata hai aur aisa karte hue ho gaye wo mujhe already char panch baar.
Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Aur uske baad jab mere paas last time phone aaya to jo bhi account manager thi ki kaisa chal raha hai maine kaha sir theek chal raha hai. Sir bataiye maine kaha madam rehne dijiye.
Customer: To baat khatam ho jati hai na aap kured kyu rahe hain samne wale ko. Aur jab aap kuredenge ab aap mujhse puchenge bataiye bataiye samasya bataiye samasya bataiye aur jab main samasya bataunga usko solution nahi milega aur aisa main pichle kam se kam teen saal se dekh raha hun to main kyu bataunga aapko.
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Aapne pucha aapki call record ho rahi hai aapne kaha chal raha hai achcha chal raha hai.
Customer: Baat khatam ho gayi.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Kyo ungli kar kar ke aap kurede rahe hain samne wale ko.
Customer: Saari cheeze achchi nahi hoti hain na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sahi baat hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Haan.
Customer: Aur rahi baat iski.
Customer: Abhi ab jaise aap phone kar rahe hain main aapko abhi 10 aisi kamiyan bata dunga IndiaMART ki.
Hmm.
Customer: Jo aap 100 logon ke sath discuss karenge jo aapke supplier hain. 100 ke 100 kahenge haan ye baat theek hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Magar wo cheeze saal dar saal se listed hain IndiaMART ki facility mein wo nahi jayengi isiliye jaisa chal raha hai vaisa chal raha hai yaar hamare paas IndiaMART hai hamare paas social media marketing ka platform hai thoda business IndiaMART se aa jata hai thoda waha se aa jata hai hamari gaadi chal rahi hai hame kya karna hai. Baat khatam ho gayi.
Customer: Haan ji ye cheeze to humse jab kureda jaye jab humko jab hamara plan jo hai khatam hone wala ho hum activate na kara rahe ho tab humse pucha jaye.
Customer: Ki bhai kya hoga kya karenge kya karenge. Sir bataiye hum solve karenge tab to samajh mein aaye.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Mere sath kam se kam do baar jhoot bol kar ke paisa le liya gaya hai IndiaMART ne. Jhoot bol kar ke.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kya jhoot bol kar.
Customer: Bataiye ab aap ab aapko ab aapko lagega ki yaar aisa to nahi ho sakta hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa ho sakta hai.
Customer: Maine ek main aur haan maine jab ye jo subscription hai jab maine do saal pehle renew karaya tha to maine ye shart rakhi thi ki main renew tab karaunga ki mujhe apna inbox bilkul empty chahiye.
Hmm.
Customer: Kyo? Kyunki yaar hamare paas aati hain din bhar mein 100 lead. 100 mein se 90 hamari kaam ki nahi hoti hain kahin se kahin tak yaar nahi rakhna chahte hain unko.
Hmm.
Customer: Magar nahi waha se keval wo archive mein jati hai aur archive inbox ki capacity aapki 5000 ki hai ye aapko pata hai.
Hmm.
Customer: 5000 se jyada aap delete nahi kar sakte. Wo inbox mein hi rehti hai. Hum chahte hain hamari inbox mein keval aur keval 100 enquiry ho isse kaam ki ho magar aap nahi rakh sakte.
Customer: Kyunki 5000 se jyada enquiry aap delete bhi nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Wo to possible nahi hai sahi baat hai bilkul.
Customer: Haan to mujhse kaha gaya tha theek hai aap renew karaiye hum aapka inbox khali kara kar ke denge nahi karaya. Maine kaha fir jo aapki jo capacity hai archive box ki wo badhwaiye.
Hmm.
Customer: 20000 20000 karaiye uski 50000 karaiye.
Hmm.
Customer: Bhai hame nahi rakhna apne main inbox mein faltu ki lead. Prashant ji aap.
Customer: Agar aap chahte hain ki hum din bhar aapka IndiaMART khol kar ke jo bhi kaam kare wahin se kare to jahir si baat hai kachra waha se hatana padega.
Customer: Hum ghar ke jis kone mein jyada baithna pasand karte hain office mein jisme baithna pasand karte hain wo saaf suthra chahiye godam mein to baith ke kaam hum nahi karenge.
Hmm.
Customer: Aap samajh rahe hain na meri baat jab mere paas inbox mein 50 lead padi hui hai 50 mein se 40 mere kaam ki nahi hai to jo 10 lead hai fresh hai jinko mujhe follow up karna hai to unko follow up karne ke liye main 50 lead ke dhamele wale box mein nahi jaunga na wo 10 lead main yaha se utha kar ke bas samne le jaunga waha se follow up karunga.
Hmm.
Customer: Samjhe na meri baat ko.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: To mera kehne ka matlab hai jaisa chal raha hai vaisa chalne do jab samne wala aapko complaint kar hi nahi raha hai to usse kured kar kyu puchna aur jab aapne puchna hai to uska solution do aur jab usse pichli 10 baar se solution nahi mila hai to wo 11vi baar batayega kyu.
Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Nahi sahi baat hai aapki bhi apni jagah pe aap sahi ho.
Executive: Aur dusri cheez jo aap bol rahe the abhi ye wali cheeze ki inbox khali wali hai. Main aapko batata hun koi bhi process jo IndiaMART ka nahi main aapko vaisa bhi bata raha hun. Sirf ek customer nahi wo change hota hai to fir sab jitne bhi supplier registered hai sabke liye ek sath hota hai.
Customer: Baat theek hai aapki main pehle bhi keh raha hun main to aapke software mein development ki baat kar raha hun aap software update karte hain na wo aisa to hai nahi ki usme scientist level ka usme software lagega jo normal aapke developer hai wahi develop karenge aur ye koi bahut badi baat bhi nahi hai aap ye bataiye aap jate hain kisi bhi trip pe apne love ones ke sath jate hain apni family ke sath jate hain waha aap 60 photo click karte hain.
Hmm.
Customer: Aap jis trip pe panch saal pehle gaye the 60 photo click kiye the aapke phone mein usme se kitne photo hain abhi. 60 mein se pehle 60 rakhta hai aadmi sambhal kar ke fir thode din mein jate hain use lagta hai yaar memory full ho rahi hai ye wale 10 delete kar do last mein aake selected 10 hi reh jate hain.
Hmm sahi baat hai.
Customer: Theek hai. To selected hi chahiye hota hai aadmi ko inbox mein agar aap permanently delete nahi kar sakte to aap kam se kam jo aapka archived box hai uski capacity badhaiye.
Hmm.
Customer: Ye to koi bahut badi baat nahi hai ye to out of the way ja kar ke maine aap se koi improvement nahi mang liya. Theek hai. Jab ye aisa IM ki service mein le raha tha to maine pucha madam se maine kaha mujhe ek cheez clear kar do.
Customer: Ki mera mujhe yaha tak knowledge hai ki main aapke inbox mein hi rahunga aur customer jo hai wo whatsapp pe rahega bole nahi aap bhi whatsapp pe aa jayenge. Maine meri mere paas recording bhi hai unki.
Hmm.
Customer: Mere paas recording bhi hai unki.
Hmm.
Customer: To ab baat hua wahi. Supplier to inbox mein hi rehta hai customer whatsapp pe rehta hai usme. Theek hai ab jab maine unko complaint kiya.
Customer: To aap payment refund le lo.
Hmm.
Customer: Maine kaha payment refund le lo maine kaha ye kaun si baat hoti hai. Unhone madam ne bola payment refund le lo.
Hmm.
Customer: To maine kaha koi baat nahi jaisa hai use kar rahe hain ab ek dedh mahina usko use karne ke baad hame ek ajeeb pareshani mehsoos hui. Jab hamare paas uska subscription nahi tha.
Hmm.
Customer: To hum customer ko catalog share kar sakte the waha se. Ab customer jab tak reply nahi kar raha hai.
Customer: Tab tak hum usko catalog share nahi kar pa rahe. Matlab humne aapko 17800 ka payment diya aur hamare paas jo facility available thi wo bhi chali gayi.
Customer: To hame payment kharch karne ka nuksan hua ya fayda hua aap bataiye.
Executive: Ye aap wale ki aap baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Maine kaha ab kara do refund ab nahi hoga ye kaun si baat hui aapki galti thi to aap refund karane ko taiyar the hame service achchi nahi lag rahi hai hame aur nuksan ho raha hai.
Customer: Case to wahi hai na IM ka. Aapne jhoot bol kar becha tha na mujhe maine fir bhi liya tha magar usme ek cheez dusra bhi nuksan hone laga ab kara do refund ab nahi ho sakta to ye kaun si baat hui aur jab nahi ho sakta main wahi aap se keh raha hun jab problems batane ke baad solution nahi milte hain to aadmi problem batayega hi nahi.
Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai sahi baat hai. Haan ji nahi main samajh raha hun aap jo bol rahe hain.
Customer: Aapke andar kabiliyat hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Aap manager hain.
Hmm.
Customer: Aapka jo jiske jiske head hain aap jiske upar aapne kaafi kaam matlab wo jo padh gaya uske andar utni kabiliyat to hogi.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aapko jab aapka office aate honge to aapko table saaf milta hoga ho sakta hai ki employee ko table apna saaf karna padta ho. Kyunki jitni kam kabiliyat hoti hai utni kam facility milti hai.
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Theek hai same isi tarike se main GST number le kar ke baitha hun main aapka subscription le kar ke baitha hun aapke yaha free listing bhi hoti hai.
Hmm.
Customer: To free listing wale ke andar to koi uska to koi invest hi nahi hai.
Customer: Na GST ka de raha hai na kisi ka de raha hai wo market mein jab mujhse competition karta hai ja kar ke wo to free wale cheez de dega. Tab maine ye bola tha aap se teen saal panch saal pehle ki kam se kam GST number to compulsory karo IndiaMART pe free listing ke liye aur free listing ka ek period to karo kam se kam ki sir teen mahine aapne trial le liya ab aap payment kariye warna aapki listing deactivate ho rahi hai aapka magar IndiaMART kyu sunega IndiaMART jab sunega jab IndiaMART ka bura waqt aayega abhi IndiaMART ka achcha waqt chal raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai ye baat jo hai meri wo senseless nahi hai aap jab kisi naye supplier ko list kar rahe hain free listing de rahe hain at least GST number to lijiye uska. Uske paas na GST hai na aapka subscription hai.
Hmm.
Customer: Kaise karega wo. Uske liye mujhe tark diye jate hain aur un tark ko sabka main nishkri karne ke bavajud bhi aaj tak nahi suna jata. Theek hai isiliye jaisa chal raha hai vaisa aap chalne dijiye aapka jo naya employee aata hai usse kahin jyada jankari IndiaMART ki main rakhta hun. Kyunki main 11 saal se IndiaMART pe listed hun.
Customer: Theek hai. Isiliye jaisa chal raha hai vaisa chalne dijiye aap pareshan mat hoiye vyavhar mein koi kami nahi thi aapke na koi badtameezi ki koi baat hai magar jab bhi mere paas phone aaye agar main samne se kuch nahi batana chah raha hun to pucha na jaye jabardasti.
Executive: Main update kar dunga is cheez ko update kar deta hun Prashant ji is cheez ko bhi main. Bas maine isliye nahi kiya tha ki aap kya kehte hain jo ye feedback tha ye iske liye tha mujhe laga ki shayad. Sir feedback diya na maine kaha na panch saal pehle feedback diya tha maine ki GST to kam se kam compulsory karo free listing ke liye paid supplier keval list ban jati hai unki.
Hmm hmm free listing ki to ban jati hai sab.
Executive: Bas ye aapne jo feedback whatsapp pe diya tha account manager ke liye hame wo cheez lagi sirf mera call isliye tha ki ho sakta hai aapke sath mein kuch matlab baat aisi nahi nahi nahi nahi jisse aap matlab satisfied nahi ho isliye main aapko.
Customer: Us baat ne mujhe phone kiya. Theek hai na to main aapka employee hun na aap mere employee ho magar jis company ke aap employee hain usko paisa de raha hun main.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Aap mera feedback lenge meri sunenge agar main keh raha hun ki phone rakh dijiye aap phone rakh dijiye.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai. Sahi baat hai bilkul sahi baat hai. Main main aap agar aapke paas record ho to maine usme do baar kaha hai unse ki madam aap phone rakh dijiye.
Customer: Haan katunga to achcha nahi lagega. Haan maine do baar kaha hai. Nahi sir bataiye kya batau main kyu batau.
Customer: Bataiye jab solution nahi hai to nahi hai to theek hai. Main mera ek seedha seedha sa principle hai ki main particular koi service ya koi relation main ab uske andar jo kamiyan hai to kamiyan badalne nahi ja raha hun us kami ke sath agar main usko accept kar sakta hun theek hai agar us kami ke sath accept nahi kar sakta main chhod dunga.
Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Kyunki kamiyan sudharne ke liye main paida nahi hua hun. Nahi sahi baat hai. Aapko ek din khud samajh mein aayega mere valuable feedback. Theek hai nahi aa raha hai samajh mein abhi koi baat nahi kisi din aayenge samajh mein. Sahi baat hai kabhi na kabhi. Itni badi badi company ab aa ho gaye IndiaMART to just B to B hai. Just B to B hai.
Customer: Kuch nahi hai. Haan.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai bhaiya. Bilkul sir bilkul sahi baat hai sir aapki. Bas aapke paas mein ek feedback aur jayega fir sir aapke employee ke liye hai wo bhi wo bhi mail pe jayega aapke. Theek hai theek hai bhaiya. Hai na. Theek. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Feels IndiaMART pokes too much for feedback.

- No solution after reporting problems.

- Feels cheated by false promises during subscription.

- Wants option to permanently delete inbox leads.

- Free listings compete unfairly with paid subscriptions.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's concerns.

- Executive assured to update the feedback.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, subscription, leads, refund, gst, listing
